item.title: Building a Web App With Go, Gin and React
item.description: TL;DR: In this tutorial, I’ll show you how easy it is to build a web application with Go and the Gin framework and add authentication to it. Check out the Github repo for the code we’re going to write. Gin is a high-performance micro-framework that delivers a very minimalistic framework that carries with it only the most essential features, libraries, and functionalities needed to build web applications and microservices. It makes it simple to build a request handling pipeline from modular, reusable pieces.
